data.title: Hun Sen urges diplomacy on Ko Kut, legal action on extremism
data.description: Senate President Hun Sen has stressed that national stability and positive relations with neighbouring countries are essential for a nation’s development.

data.title: Four legal and factual angles in the Khao Kradong Land case
data.description: Is political influence complicating a straightforward case in which a clear ruling has been issued?

data.title: Unicef turns Wat Arun blue for World Children's Day with youth leaders
data.description: On World Children's Day on November 20, Thailand's iconic Wat Arun was illuminated in Unicef blue as leaders from government, civil society, and business gathered with young people in a powerful display of commitment to improving children's futures.

data.title: Hun Manet defends government’s silence on Ko Kut dispute
data.description: Prime Minister Hun Manet has addressed the government’s decision to remain silent on the sovereignty dispute over Ko Kut, citing ongoing maritime border negotiations with Thailand that have yet to yield an agreement. Both nations currently claim the island as part of their territory.

data.title: Mackerel magic takes centre stage at Samut Sakhon festival
data.description: For the 14th year, the Tha Chalom community showcases its famous fresh fish in traditional favourites and innovative creations

data.title: Making a killing from earthworms, geckos and leeches
data.description: Locals in a Nakhon Phanom village are earning millions of baht in revenue from a unique trade

data.title: 20 new establishments make it to Michelin Guide Thailand
data.description: The 2025 Michelin Guide Thailand has added 20 new food establishments to its prestigious Bib Gourmand selection, bringing the total to 156.

data.title: Vets consider trimming tusks of Plai Sak Surin to improve mobility
data.description: Carers say the rescued elephant’s tusks are too long and too heavy for him to comfortably navigate hills and avoid obstacles

data.title: One Bangkok unveils Sarapad Thai, a celebration of Thai craftsmanship
data.description: From homeware and fashion accessories to art toys and food products, store offers something for everyone

data.title: Thailand's household debt rises to a worrying THB1.2 trillion
data.description: SME non-performing loans have seen a 20% year-on-year increase, NCB report reveals

data.title: House panel urges Thaksin to defend his ‘detention’ in hospital suite
data.description: Opposition MP who chairs the panel claims it is widely believed the ex-PM’s government connections allowed him special treatment

data.title: Thailand banks on affordable solar power to ease price burden on citizens
data.description: Development of an affordable solar power system prototype by NSTDA offers hope, says energy minister

data.title: 4 explosions rock Narathiwat’s Muang district, no injuries reported
data.description: Police suspect the explosives were detonated by a new generation of insurgents who do not cause deaths or injuries among civilians

data.title: IconSiam says it had no role in ‘Rich Man’s Mu Kratha’ promotion
data.description: Post on the riverside mall’s Facebook page sparks outrage, with many saying the prices were ridiculously high and some suspecting it was a marketing stunt

data.title: Thailand aims to achieve net zero carbon emissions ahead of schedule
data.description: Thailand has set clear goals and appointed agencies responsible for climate change mitigation in a bid to achieve net zero carbon emissions earlier than 2065.

data.title: Miss Universe Thailand returns home to a hero's welcome
data.description: Opal, who finished 3rd runner-up, thanks government and Thais for ‘unwavering support’

data.title: A festive celebration of American beef
data.description: The upcoming festive season is a good time to celebrate the taste of American excellence. Whether dining out or cooking at home, the American Beef Feast showcases the finest in American agriculture, starting tomorrow until Dec 31.

data.title: Immerse in the world of drones
data.description: The latest innovations in drone technology will be presented during DronTech Asia 2024, which will take place at Impact Exhibition Hall 12, Muang Thong Thani, from Nov 25-27, daily from 10am to 6pm.

data.title: 12 bodies exhumed from controversial temple in Kamphaeng Phet
data.description: Temple told to provide evidence if the bodies had been legally transferred

data.title: AMLO opens registration for iCon Group victims ahead of asset seizure
data.description: People have until February 17 to register for compensation on AMLO’s website and are required to present police complaints and proof of transactions

data.title: LVMH’s Arnault opens Bangkok Forbes CEO summit with leadership insights
data.description: Luxury tycoon, one of world’s wealthiest individuals, recounts trials and triumphs on his journey to business success

data.title: Thai PM targets food, healthcare, soft power to drive economy
data.description: The premier highlights plans to revive ‘Thai Kitchen to the World’ policy, improve healthcare access and boost soft power through cultural tourism

data.title: So far, so good: How Paetongtarn has done in her first 100 days
data.description: PM has benefited from the groundwork laid by Srettha, but many policy challenges ahead

data.title: A cultural gem in Macau
data.description: The Poly MGM Museum recently celebrated its grand opening at the MGM Macau, marking a defining moment for Macau

data.title: No ruling yet on Surachate’s fight against police dismissal: court
data.description: The administrative court office says the media jumped the gun when it reported that the former deputy national police chief lost the case against the police commission

data.title: British tourist falls to his death down a Phuket roadside pit
data.description: Security camera footage shows the tourist climbing over the barrier before losing his balance and falling to his death

data.title: Less than half of Thailand’s drug addicts in rehab: health minister
data.description: The Public Health Ministry says that despite the change in legislation, a little over 200,000 drug addicts have sought treatment this year

data.title: Bangkok’s biggest floral fair to bloom from December 1-10
data.description: Suan Luang Rama IX Park showcasing over 600,000 blossoms, cultural performances, fireworks, and plant exhibitions

data.title: Ratchaburi’s Nasatta Park is all lit up for the cool season
data.description: Visitors can make the most of the illuminations and even dress in traditional Thai attire for a souvenir photo shoot

data.title: Minor Hotels Targets Aggressive Asian Expansion with Global Ambitions
data.description: Group unveils strategy to surpass 1,000 hotels worldwide within the next five years, aiming for double-digit expansion from 2025 onwards

data.title: ASEAN IPO market should rebound in 2025: Deloitte report
data.description: Leading financial consulting firm optimistic on outlook for 2025 but warns that Thailand’s recovery likely to be slow

data.title: Digital transformation key to surviving economic uncertainty
data.description: Transition to the digital economy and adopt AI and big data, ex-finance minister Somkid Jatusripitak tells business community

data.title: Thailand’s digital competitiveness falls in world rankings
data.description: Thailand Management Association blames shortcomings in technology for drop and urges government to promote development of AI

data.title: 1,000 Days of resilience: Ukraine’s struggle amid Russian invasion
data.description: On November 19, the world marks 1,000 days since Russia’s full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

data.title: Govt to tackle THB1.31 trillion NPLs of households, SMEs
data.description: Interest payments for those NPLs that qualify for the campaign will be suspended for 3 years, Finance Ministry announces
